column3: For sale only through designated retailer. Retailer must be named in <SalesOutletName>. Use only when it is not possible to assign the more explicit code 04 or 05.
For editions sold only though office supplies wholesalers. Retailer(s) and/or distributor(s) may be named in <SalesOutletName>

column2: Internal publisher use only: do not list
column3: For an ISBN that is assigned for a publisher's internal purposes
For sale only through designated retailer, though not under retailer's own brand/imprint. Retailer must be named in <SalesOutletName>.
For sale only through designated retailer under retailer's own brand/imprint. Retailer must be named in <SalesOutletName>.
For sale to libraries only; not for sale through retail trade
For sale directly to schools only; not for sale through retail trade
